pageContext.claim: “I support strong, meaningful background checks, where people that should not have guns, people that are insane, people that are mentally ill, people that are bad, bad people -- like this guy in Philadelphia, who has been arrested numerous times; he's a bad guy -- where people like that would not have guns.”
pageContext.analysis: When political pressure rises for tighter gun controls, typically after a mass shooting, Trump usually says he's interested in strengthening federal requirements for background checks. But he invariably abandons those plans later on.
